name: Komala
author: nagimiso
flavor_text: It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its movements are apparently no more than the results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever you attach an Energy from your hand to it, it is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Hypno Roll
attacks.effect: This attack can be used if this Pokémon is Asleep. If it is not Asleep, this attack does nothing.
